{{Infobox military person |name= Leo Davies |image= File:Air Marshal Gavin Davies at the Pacific Air Chiefs Symposium.jpg |image_size= |alt= |caption= Davies (right) at the Pacific Air Chiefs Symposium |birth_date= |death_date= |birth_place= |death_place= |placeofburial= |nickname= |allegiance= Australia |branch= [[Royal Australian Air Force]] |serviceyears= 1979 – |rank= [[Air marshal (Australia)|Air Marshal]] |servicenumber= |unit= |commands= [[Chief of Air Force (Australia)|Chief of Air Force]] (2015–)
[[Deputy Chief of Air Force (Australia)|Deputy Chief of Air Force]] (2012–15)
[[No. 82 Wing RAAF]] (2004–05)
[[No. 1 Squadron RAAF]] (2002–03) |battles= [[Iraq War]] |awards= [[Officer of the Order of Australia]]
[[Conspicuous Service Cross (Australia)|Conspicuous Service Cross]]
[[Legion of Merit|Officer of the Legion of Merit]] (United States) |relations= |laterwork= }} [[Air marshal (Australia)|Air Marshal]] '''Gavin Neil "Leo" Davies''' {{postnominals|country=AUS|size=100%|sep=,|AO|CSC}} is a senior officer of the [[Royal Australian Air Force]]. He has served as [[Chief of Air Force (Australia)|Chief of Air Force]] since 4 July 2015. ==Military career== Davies joined the [[Royal Australian Air Force]] in 1979.{{cite web|url=http://www.airforce.gov.au/Our-People/Our-Leaders/Chief-of-Air-Force/?RAAF-cIPygzYc/Fwxxi5dCKVD3g8SFEpfUGXS|title=Our leaders|publisher=Royal Australian Air Force|accessdate=3 July 2015}} He became commanding officer of [[No. 1 Squadron RAAF]] in 2002, officer commanding [[No. 82 Wing RAAF]] at [[RAAF Base Amberley]] in 2004 and Director Combat Capability within Air Force Headquarters in 2006. He went on to be Director General Capability Planning in 2008, air [[attaché]] in [[Washington, D.C.]] in 2010 and [[Deputy Chief of Air Force (Australia)|Deputy Chief of Air Force]] in 2012. He became [[Chief of Air Force (Australia)|Chief of Air Force]] on 4 July 2015. Davies was appointed an [[Officer of the Order of Australia]] in 2014.{{cite web|url=http://www.itsanhonour.gov.au/honours/honour_roll/search.cfm?aus_award_id=1148861&search_type=simple&showInd=true|title=Gavin Davies|publisher=It's an honour|accessdate=3 July 2015}} ==References== {{reflist}} {{s-start}} {{s-mil}} {{s-bef|before=Air Marshal [[Geoff Brown (RAAF officer)|Geoff Brown]]}} {{s-ttl|title=[[Chief of Air Force (Australia)|Chief of Air Force]]|years=2015 –}} {{s-inc}} {{s-bef|before=Air Vice Marshal [[Neil Hart (RAAF officer)|Neil Hart]]}} {{s-ttl|title=[[Deputy Chief of Air Force (Australia)|Deputy Chief of Air Force]]|years=2012–2015}} {{s-aft|after={{nowrap|Air Vice Marshal [[Waren McDonald]]}}}} {{s-end}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Davies, Leo}} [[Category:Australian military personnel of the Iraq War]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Officers of the Legion of Merit]] [[Category:Officers of the Order of Australia]] [[Category:Recipients of the Conspicuous Service Cross (Australia)]] [[Category:Royal Australian Air Force air marshals]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] {{Australia-mil-bio-stub}}
